attributes.review: This app took about 1-2 weeks to download so I was in a “HORRENDOUS MOOD” so I took my fish named cat for a walk and we played in the park with other cats then we got home and the app still wasn’t downloaded so I took a nap but before that I started dreaming that I cut all the tags off my pillow but I woke up and I actually did it ...... so someone called the pillow police on me and I was charged with pillow abuse so I was in prison for about a week or so.Then I got home and I got a call from the one and only DONALD DUMP and he said we are  tremendously making this app GREAT AGAIN. So then I knew “ALL MY PROBLEMS WOULD GO AWAY “ and they did......then a day later the app finally opened  so my life was GREAT AGAIN but then....................... I was so frightened by what I saw it was a video of  trump paying melania the monthly fee for pretending to be his wife I was SHOCKED I was HURT I felt BETRAYED my Donald would do this to me.So I packed up all my stuff including my fish  named cat and we moved to Australia and we lived with kangaroos then one day I got one of the kangaroos named Karen mad and she took it out on cat and ate him. That was one of the worst days of my life, all I wanted to do was cut everybody’s tags off their pillows but I had to stay calm because that’s what cat would’ve wanted. So then I packed up my stuff and left Australia and moved Iceland I don’t know why. Then shortly after I bought another fish named DOG😅🐶 So ya that’s my story.SO DON’T EVER DOWNLOAD THIS APP Unless you want your fish to die ok thanks for listening and merry Christmas 🎄
attributes.title: It killed my fish named cat

attributes.review: when i downloaded the app it started saying some weird evil chant i couldn’t even turn my phone down. the chant began to say maga. i was utterly terrified. every time i tried to turn my phone down from the awful noise it just turned up louder. when the app finally loaded my phone flash light turned on and began to flash red and white i was so confused. after 5 mins of being on the app it completely hacked my phone and my tv began to glitch and play the weird chanting music again along with my laptop and my microwave. i was really scared. i tried deleting the app but every time i did the maga chanting began to get louder and louder so all my appliances were chanting maga, my blender, can opener, oven, refrigerator, coffee maker, washer, dryer, and more it came to the point where i had to unplug everything in my house. i left for a couple days and stayed in a hotel. and when i got there the app finally deleted after several hours of being terrified
attributes.title: HE HAS NO LIPS HOW WILL HE GET A KISS KISS

attributes.review: This app messed up my phone. Tbh it’s worth 0 stars but the App Store is making me be nice. When I opened the app I was shown some very graphic pictures of an incredibly sweaty orange man with hair that looks like thin noodles. Then it took me a minute to realize it was Donaldo Trumpet. After viewing the pictures I exited the app. AND THE PICTURES BECAME MY LOCK SCREEN. I was honestly so traumatized I had to pour bleach in my eyes. Which caused me to be blind. But then I could still see the image in my head, so I decided to inject myself with bleach, like our wonderfully handsome president advised. WHICH THEN LED TO MY DEATH. Anyways stream Be Happy, coming to a local Justice near you💖

This app has hacked into my tik tok and liked all of the femme boy friday videos while also commenting🎂😘 on all of the videos. I don’t think it is ok for trump to log into my account and look at these femme boys if he is trying to delete the app. I’m also upset with the composition of the app. There are no cool things. Barron didn’t even show up. Why do you need an app you are a president this isn’t a school election where you text people and tell em to vote for you. This is the presidency. Just become a femme boy and u will have my support. Anyways stan Michelle Obama got clear skin
